tooltip: Select Queen Sulkaris, the Fallen Sage as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Sulkaris focuses on improving the regeneration rate of Gohma units.
Allows you to summon Sulkaris, a massive creature hero that tears apart enemies with her claws.
Support unit that disrupts enemy Line of Sight and projectile accuracy.
Trees spawn several Royal Larva when they have been completely harvested.
Royal Larva and Gohma Queens rapidly heal all units around themselves when slain in combat.
